site_name: Rear Of Sage Court208 Golders Green RoadLondonNW11 9AQ
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 22/5000/FUL dated 10/10/2022 for 'Construction of a new part 2-storey, part 3-storey, part 4-storey Beit Midrash (Jewish study hall), dormitory for students and caretaker unit, including a basement level, 13no. off-street parking spaces and associated site works.' Amendment to include changing the wording of condition 21 (Details of Vehicular Entrance to Rear of the Site from Public Highway) and 22 (Details of Junction(s) Between Proposed Service Road(s) and Highway) from 'prior to the commencement of development' (Condition 21) and 'within 6 months of the commencement of development' (Condition 22) to 'Following demolition works'
